QuestData.Title: A Beautiful Brooch
QuestData.Description: It is a very old, antique brooch with very detailed molding and filigree worked into the edges. It looks very valuable.$B$BThere's only one person who keeps losing jewelry to furry hooligans, and she would probably want to see this heirloom returned.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Beautiful Brooch to Tina Mudclaw at Haohan's House or Halfhill Market in the Valley of the Four Winds.
